description: Beings in non-physical suffering - hungry ghosts, spirits, land spirits (Buddhist cosmology)
note: These categories honor Buddhist cosmology and indigenous spiritual traditions

targets.name: Hungry Ghosts - Preta Realm
targets.description: Beings in the hungry ghost realm experiencing insatiable craving and deprivation (Buddhist cosmology)
targets.intention: May all hungry ghosts be liberated from craving, may they receive spiritual nourishment and favorable rebirth

additional_data.causes: extreme greed, stinginess, attachment in previous lives

targets.name: Spirits at Sites of Mass Suffering
targets.description: Beings lingering at sites of genocide, war, disasters, unable to move on
targets.intention: May all spirits at suffering sites find peace, liberation, and transition to favorable states

additional_data.practice: Phowa (consciousness transference), prayers for the dead

targets.name: Land Spirits at Destroyed Sacred Sites
targets.description: Indigenous land spirits at sacred sites that have been desecrated or destroyed
targets.intention: May all displaced land spirits find peace, may sacred sites be honored and restored

targets.name: Spirits of Animals Killed in Large Numbers
targets.description: Spirits of animals killed in factory farms, labs, hunting, etc.
targets.intention: May the spirits of all animals killed by humans find peace, liberation, and favorable rebirth

targets.name: Ghosts of the Forgotten Dead
targets.description: Unidentified remains, mass graves, unmarked graves - those with no one to pray for them
targets.intention: May all forgotten dead be remembered, honored, and liberated

targets.name: Beings in the Hell Realms
targets.description: Beings experiencing extreme suffering in hell states (Buddhist cosmology)
targets.intention: May all hell beings be freed from torment through the power of compassion, may their suffering be swift and karmic debts be cleared

additional_data.causes: extreme anger, violence, cruelty in previous lives

targets.name: Beings in the Bardo (Intermediate State)
targets.description: All beings currently between death and rebirth (up to 49 days after death)
targets.intention: May all beings in the bardo recognize the clear light, attain liberation or favorable rebirth

practices: Tibetan Book of the Dead readings

targets.name: Spirits Bound to Places of Trauma
targets.description: Ghosts unable to move on due to traumatic death (murder victims, accident victims, suicide)
targets.intention: May all trauma-bound spirits be freed, may they find peace and healing

additional_data.practice: House clearing prayers, spirit release ceremonies
